00020 #ifndef _RTAI_SERIAL_H
00021 #define _RTAI_SERIAL_H
00022 
00023 #define TTY0  0
00024 #define TTY1  1
00025 #define COM1  TTY0
00026 #define COM2  TTY1
00027 
00028 #define RT_SP_NO_HAND_SHAKE  0x00
00029 #define RT_SP_DSR_ON_TX      0x01
00030 #define RT_SP_HW_FLOW        0x02
00031 
00032 #define RT_SP_PARITY_EVEN    0x18
00033 #define RT_SP_PARITY_NONE    0x00
00034 #define RT_SP_PARITY_ODD     0x08
00035 #define RT_SP_PARITY_HIGH    0x28
00036 #define RT_SP_PARITY_LOW     0x38
00037 
00038 #define RT_SP_FIFO_DISABLE   0x00
00039 #define RT_SP_FIFO_SIZE_1    0x00
00040 #define RT_SP_FIFO_SIZE_4    0x40
00041 #define RT_SP_FIFO_SIZE_8    0x80
00042 #define RT_SP_FIFO_SIZE_14   0xC0
00043 
00044 #define RT_SP_FIFO_SIZE_DEFAULT  RT_SP_FIFO_SIZE_8
00045 
00046 #define RT_SP_DTR            0x01
00047 #define RT_SP_RTS            0x02 
00048 
00049 #define RT_SP_CTS            0x10
00050 #define RT_SP_DSR            0x20
00051 #define RT_SP_RI             0x40
00052 #define RT_SP_DCD            0x80
00053 
00054 #define RT_SP_BUFFER_FULL    0x01
00055 #define RT_SP_OVERRUN_ERR    0x02
00056 #define RT_SP_PARITY_ERR     0x04
00057 #define RT_SP_FRAMING_ERR    0x08
00058 #define RT_SP_BREAK          0x10
00059 #define RT_SP_BUFFER_OVF     0x20
00060 
00061 #define DELAY_FOREVER  0x3FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFLL

00151 /*
00152  * rt_com compatibility functions.
00153  */ 
00154 
00155 static inline int rt_com_setup(unsigned int tty,
00156                                int baud, int mode,
00157                                unsigned int parity,
00158                                unsigned int stopbits,
00159                                unsigned int numbits,
00160                                int fifotrig)
00161 {
00162         return baud <= 0 ? rt_spclose(tty) : rt_spopen(tty, baud, numbits, stopbits, parity, mode, fifotrig);
00163 }
00164 
00165 static inline int rt_com_read(unsigned int tty,
00166                               char *msg,
00167                               int msg_size)
00168 {
00169         int notrd;
00170         if ((notrd = rt_spread(tty, msg, msg_size)) >= 0) {
00171                 return msg_size - notrd;
00172         }
00173         return notrd;
00174 }
00175 
00176 static inline int rt_com_write(unsigned int tty,
00177                                char *msg,
00178                                int msg_size)
00179 {
00180         int notwr;
00181         if ((notwr = rt_spwrite(tty, msg, msg_size)) >= 0) {
00182                 return msg_size - notwr;
00183         }
00184         return notwr;
00185 }
00186 
00187 #define rt_com_clear_input(indx) rt_spclear_rx(indx)
00188 #define rt_com_clear_output(indx) rt_spclear_tx(indx)
00189 
00190 #define rt_com_write_modem(indx, mask, op) rt_spset_mcr(indx, mask, op)
00191 #define rt_com_read_modem(indx, mask) rt_spget_msr(indx, mask)
00192 
00193 #define rt_com_set_mode(indx, mode) rt_spset_mode(indx, mode)
00194 #define rt_com_set_fifotrig(indx, fifotrig) rt_spset_fifotrig(indx, fifotrig)
00195 
00196 #define rt_com_error(indx) rt_spget_err(indx)
00197 
00198 #endif /* __KERNEL__ */
